 2008-10302008-06-11CITIZENSHIP,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (PRRA) to ensure fairness through consistency in the consideration of evidence in both the reasonableness hearing as well as the Pre-Removal Risk Assessment (PRRA) and providing that the risks and danger assessments relating to the PRRA are sent to a person named in a certificate for review and response after a judge has made a decision on the reasonableness of the security certificate.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2008-0193 Publication Date: 2008-06-25
